Data Fields
bootloader_api_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Bootloader Access

Bootloader attributes. More...

#include <bootloader.h>

Collaboration diagram for bootloader_api_t:

Detailed Description

This structure contains the attributes for the bootloader.

Data Fields

u32 code_size
 The number of bytes occupied by the bootloader (so the OS knows not to erase the bootloader)
 
void(* exec )(void *args)
 Execute the bootlaoder.
 
void(* usb_dev_priv_init )(void *context)
 Use this to handle standard USB packet is using same USB setup as bootloader.
 
bootloader_aes_api_t aes
 Access to the bootloaders aes API (zero if it isn't present)
